instructions: Open Camera, then position iPhone so that the code appears on the screen. Tap the notification that appears on the screen to go to the relevant website or app.

Go to Settings > Control Center > Customize Controls, then tap the Insert button next to QR Code Reader. Open Control Center , tap the QR code reader, then position iPhone so that the code appears on the screen. To add more light, tap the flashlight to turn it on.

Image titled Uninstall Multiple System Apps on Android Step 1 1 Open Google Play. Navigate to your applications drawer and find the icon that resembles a multicolored play button on a white bag. Tap it to open. Image titled Uninstall Multiple System Apps on Android Step 2 2 Search for Uninstall Master Uninstaller. In the results, choose the one made by EasyApps Studio and tap it. You can read through the description if you wish. Image titled Uninstall Multiple System Apps on Android Step 3 3 Tap on the Install button. The app will download and install to your device. Image titled Uninstall Multiple System Apps on Android Step 4 1 Launch the app. Once download and installation has finished, you can tap on Open to launch it from the app store. Alternatively, you can go to your app drawer and look for the app. Image titled Uninstall Multiple System Apps on Android Step 5 2 Set Superuser permission. Once you reach the main app screen, your Superuser app will want to know if you ll permit the app to make changes to system files. Tap on Grant Permission. Image titled Uninstall Multiple System Apps on Android Step 6 3 Swipe to the right on the main screen. Do this until you reach the System Apps tab. Image titled Uninstall Multiple System Apps on Android Step 7 4 Select which system apps you want to delete or freeze. Warning : deleting system files may harm your device and render it unusable. Please only do this if you know what you need to delete and know that deleting won t result in harm to your device. Image titled Uninstall Multiple System Apps on Android Step 8 5 Tap "Uninstall. " Make sure the Move to Recycle Bin option is ticked in case you need to restore the apps. Image titled Uninstall Multiple System Apps on Android Step 9 6 Tap "OK," then tap "OK" again when Android prompts for your permission to delete the apps. Done! You ve successfully deleted the system apps of your choice. Advertisement
